content.html: The one positive outcome of what happened at Twitter is we see what happens when you treat employees with contempt and disrespect. Don’t communicate with them, fire half, change working conditions with no notice, fire those who criticise you, then give them an ultimatum.
content.value:
The one positive outcome of what happened at Twitter is we see what happens when you treat employees with contempt and disrespect.

Don’t communicate with them, fire half, change working conditions with no notice, fire those who criticise you, then give them an ultimatum.
